welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Pieve di Soligo, the charming city known for its beautiful landscapes and rich history. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that our city has to offer during your stay."

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at S. Angelo Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at S. Angelo Airport, primarily used for low-cost carriers.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Aviano Airport, serving domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Aviano Airport, primarily used for private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Marco Polo Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal used for low-cost airlines and charter flights.

wifi.note: Limited to 2 hours per device per day.
